verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fresh oil from the throne,
Fresh oil from the throne
Anoint us today, with fresh oil from the throne
We need the power, in this last hour
So anoint us today, with fresh oil from the throne.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fresh bread from the Head, fresh bread from the Head
Lord give us today, fresh bread from the Head
We need the power, in this last hour
So Lord give us today, fresh bread from the Head.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fresh wine from the vine, etc.
New life without strife, etc.
New life in body life, etc.
New love in body life, etc.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nuevo aceite de Dios, del trono de Dios
Oh Señor danos hoy, nuevo aceite de Dios.
Poder necesitamos en la que hora en que andamos,
Oh Señor danos hoy, nuevo aceite de Dios.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Nuevo vino de Dios de tu viña Señor
Oh Señor danos hoy, nuevo aceite de Dios.
Gracia necesitamos en la hora en que andamos
Oh Señor danos hoy, nuevo aceite de Dios.
